attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown,
we are writing with regards to all the young people who are being bought these super hatchbacks with very loud sound systems in them. I bring your attention to this because there hearing is being affected by these systems and if a stop is not put to these young people using these systems in their cars, then there is going to be a whole generation with middle aged deafness, which will cost the NHS millions of pounds in hearing aids. Please look at this issue with concern.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
